author: Jerad Libhart
comment: Keeps dropping calls due to popping ads mid call. I can hear others clearly but they keep saying I always sound like I am breaking up to them. It isn't performing as hoped. Had to call the power company 6 times just to try and complete a single conversation due to drops. Gave up after the last one.  Update:  still dropping important calls mid call.  Very aggravating and not dependable.  No response from the developer is bad

author: Talisha McCutcheon
comment: I am so very disappointed with this app. I've used this for many years as my home phone number. But lately it has worked horribly. Constantly freezing and crashing. Not ringing, or any notification someone has text either. Now, even worse, it won't even open at all. I'm really unhappy, and I truly had such high hopes. Please fix, or lose a loyal customer of any years!!!

author: Rodeo Gzz
comment: Cool app they should really work on the ads the ads are pesky then sometimes the call sometimes and even when using WIFI and having actual service on your phone  still drops. This is not the Migos I don't need drop top service#facts LOL but I fuks with y'all so I don't know fix it

author: Ab Ah
comment: It was fine before it start adding "--sent from Freetone" to every text.  I can understand ads as it added revenue to the company. This however is nothing but a bother.  This is an annoying tactic installed to bother you and your friends into purchasing a subscription hiding under the idea that its advertising to your friends, when in fact the lack of the  app telling people it was an app was the biggest draw, most people acted surprised and wanted the app as a cheap alternative line for texting, and calls.        The app working like it was a contract phone plan, but instead of monthly payment you pay with ads, Was an inspired idea. I fear the direction this app is going.

author: Joe Wiley
comment: Way to many adds the ahdds slow the texting and talk down and now there's so many adds its slowed the whole phone down and every time you go to text some one the adds get clicked instead of what you want to click on. This once was a great app but now has so many adds its has become almost unusable in my own opinion. I've had this app for over 5 years now and it has never been bad till now when I first got the app it was great but now needs fixed to get all the bugs out

No matter the amount of wifi I have, it won't let me send anything, it says thay it failed, and when I try to resend it, it still wont send. When it actually sends it says sent from freetone, which is just crappy advertisement.....

This app worked great for a while, but recently stopped ringing when people call my number. I have missed several important calls because it randomly stopped ringing, even though I didn't change anything in the settings.

author: Jaymee Ebardt
comment: Love this app. My hubby and I use it when we don't feel like turning on our phones. The ads get in the way but besides that its a great app

author: Julien Houle
comment: I payed for no ads, but im still getting adds from your company, like whenever i text it says "sent from freetone"! Thus is so annoying!😣

author: Jodie Wilkinson
comment: This app started out great but now I can't even make a phone call and I don't think texts are even going through. If it doesn't start working again I will be uninstalling

author: Nicole Badran
comment: During a call i am not able to paste a number on the dial pad like an order code before the #. I think you should add that feature.

author: Richard Reineke
comment: When staying in other parts of the country it provides you with fast and easy to use local numbers for calling and texting. I love the fact that it does call forwarding to my cell phone.

author: Greg Koester
comment: Love this app. It gives you a phone number and allows you to text and make calls from it over Wi-Fi for free!!!

author: aria amiry
comment: I think its the best app ever mainly its free and you can do phone calls and very good qualoty you can here exactly everything the other person is saying and they can here you. You should get it🙄🙄

author: kayla bumbalough
comment: I have had this app for a while now but with this new update I am not liking the signature that is tagged onto the texts.

author: Are you a fan or a follower??
comment: Really enjoy having a phone to call people, I don't have service on my phone and can't afford any at this moment and I have wifi so this one works so I can make phone calls thanks so much free tone

author: Cornell Forbes
comment: It does what it's  supposed  to do, and that is what you expect,good product!

author: Danyuel Austin
comment: Damn call only 14-15mins fix this or get boycotted

author: Shiromi Torayoshi
comment: The connection is awful and you can't call emergency numbers. Ads are everywhere. But at least you can call and text free.

author: Zhang Honglin
comment: It only offers several minutes of free calling. And it constantly asks me submitting a score.

author: ameer zaidi
comment: I purchased Canadian # and also purchased credits still not able to call in Canada I want refund

author: ladyhorse1304
comment: So far so good...the ads are a bit annoying but for the most part its a very helpful app n the fact that it can find n connect to hotspots is real plus so I don't always have to b at home to use it

author: truth mullins
comment: Well I use it all the time. But lately I haven't been able to even get in, the app. Thinking of trying something else. Unless a update takes place.

author: forza horison gamer Small
comment: Hi i was loving this app on my s5 plus europe edition and it now wont open pls fix
Keeps hanging up outta nowhere. Horrible app

author: Ibrahim Ronna
comment: For all those who think should I get this or not well you should you actually get to make free phone calls and text it's all free 😉😄😍😃😚😀
Very advance communication tool, keeping up very well with global village concept of 21st century. Hats off to free tone team!

author: Rachid Sinno
comment: Used to work all the time. Now, many times, it does not ring.
2 stars because of the description that stated I will be given free phone number. And it is no use as it will last only 15 min.

author: jay2 king3
comment: Enjoyed it until last up date now app don't respond won't open and message don't come in

author: August leija
comment: Its a cool app for texting and calling, if my children want to text their friends then I would download this app for them

author: Paladin Davis
comment: I like this and its features, but wish, at least on my device, that it didn't interfere with other apps when chatheads are active.

author: lexi flavion
comment: Love the app but after the new update it stopped working for me!😭😭😭

author: Shaylyn Mari
comment: I think its a good app to have esp if you don't want someone having your number😀

author: Jessica Hinrichs
comment: Drops every call I make.

author: Danelle Queen
comment: Every time I open the app it closes immediately

author: karolynn Azua
comment: I love my new number and I can make free calls without having to earn it!
I love this app cause my phone is off so I had to find a way to call someone I used this and it worked

author: Keith Scoville
comment: Horrible ads and spam links
I love it because you just have to click 3 times and then your in a call!!!😀😀😁😂😂😄😃
